summary: This document is a Council Decision regarding a Memorandum of Understanding between the European Community and the Arab Republic of Egypt on trade in textile products. It indicates the provisional application of the Memorandum until its formal conclusion, conditional upon reciprocal application by Egypt. The decision was made by the Council of the European Union on December 18, 1997, and is published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
evidence_for_task: The document outlines the Council's decision to provisionally apply a trade memorandum with Egypt on textile products, indicating the conditions and scope of this application.
preconditions: An existing agreement between the European Community and the Arab Republic of Egypt on textile trade.
effects: Provisionally allows for the trade memorandum to be effective pending completion of formalities, facilitating continued trade relations.
field_information: Council Decision (98/135/EC) concerning textile trade between Europe and Egypt.
bbox_refs: Details about text blocks and their positions are available in pages.json. Most relevant are blocks of type 9-23.

task_classification.reasoning: The document classifies and describes a legal decision regarding an international trade agreement.
task_classification.notes: Focus on legal procedures and agreement stipulations.
